data.title: KillBill (Production Notes) PDF
data.meta_description: KillBill(Production-Notes).pdf - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides a synopsis and background information on Quentin Tarantino's film Kill Bill Vol. 1. It summarizes that the film tells the story of The Bride seeking revenge on her former assassin teammates after they try to kill her on her wedding day. It follows her as she tracks down and battles her targets, including O-Ren Ishii. The document also discusses Tarantino's influences from Asian martial arts and exploitation films and how he cast iconic actors from those genres in the film.
